title: If Garen's Ult kills Jarvan IV while J4 is the Villain
body: J4's corpse should change to LeBlanc.

replies.body:
are there even enough people that have been around long enough, let alone people that actually read JoJ back in the day, to even understand the reference?

upvoted anyway cus i gets it c:
It would be a neat nod to older players, and desperately-needed evidence that Riot cares about lore.
last time they "cared about the lore" they subjected us to an obnoxious announcer and they flat out disabled gangplank. yeah, I'd rather they didn't care about it.
While giving us a kick-ass event and a pretty neat GP rework, alongside a free GP skin if you played GP and owned him during the event.

> [{quoted}](name=tombdragon,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=RzU9KbEX,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2015-09-13T01:18:27.827+0000)
>
> While giving us a kick-ass event and a pretty neat GP rework, alongside a free GP skin if you played GP and owned him during the event.

except, you know, you couldn't play GP for like half the event

top kek

They should have done what China(?) did and enabled Spooky GP, disabling the other skins.

Just saying, the whole deal wasn't all that bad.

Wait, China did that?

And they didn't do that for the other regions, even though we asked for it?

GOD DAMMIT RIOT
Well, see, Riot made LoL and is located in NA, but Riot is owned by Tencent, a Chinese company. So the parent company can do whatever they want.

Nnnnnope, those are investors. is quite different.

However in china tencent has the rights to publish its own client, and treat it accordingly. but only in china and only the client and the servers.

Rito doesn't own LoL in China that's why China has different stuff.

I don't remember which server got Silent Night Sona for free if you moved your account there (I think Turkey, not sure) when it opened, it was back when Rot wouldn't sell it.
a kick-ass event where the announcer was so obnoxious I couldn't even play ranked? that event?

Some people liked it, some people didn't. I'm of the former, you must be the latter, but that doesn't mean any of us are wrong for liking/not liking it.

Sorry it disrupted your ranked games.
i liked it. wish i  could enable it.

> [{quoted}](name=tombdragon,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=RzU9KbEX,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2015-09-13T01:18:27.827+0000)
>
> While giving us a kick-ass event and a pretty neat GP rework, alongside a free GP skin if you played GP and owned him during the event.

What event?
Seriously, what event?  Oh, you mean summoners rift with different minions.
Oh, never mind you mean ARAM with cannons for turrets.

An entire map reskin with high detail, even in the background.

An entirely new announcer (only temp tho...) for all map modes.

Game achievements (that required grinding, like I said earlier this lore event was really flawed... which helps to improve future lore events) that unlocked icons.

A *free* skin if you played GP during the event and owned him.

And did I mention **LORE?** 

I mean, if you really think the event was just replacing turrets with cannons, you are the king of understatement and completely ignored the level of art detail and the substance of the event. People really liked it too. It wasn't perfect, but Rito will (hopefully) improve their game.

tl;dr: it was a little more than changing turrets. Get an eye exam :P

> [{quoted}](name=tombdragon,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=RzU9KbEX,comment-id=000000000000000000020000,timestamp=2015-09-14T05:17:51.465+0000)

> 
> tl;dr: it was a little more than changing turrets. Get an eye exam :P

Woa a Free Skin!
Woa man, I really gotta give it to Riot if that's what it takes to get players heads over heels about an event.

And no, it wasn't a little more than changing a turret, it was changing a turret. xD

I gave you five things and you just focus on one to try and make it seem smaller than it actually was.

You're not going to be happy in life with that habit.

How about Riot never has lore or events again? Would that make you happy?

But this reference isn't even that old - the theory only reached its peak popularity a couple years ago. I know it was around way before that, but it's not like it's disappeared from Reddit/the forums for that long.
I've only been playing for a year and I get it. Just cause someone's new doesn't mean they don't read up on lore... {{item:3070}}
Referencing **GASP** OLD LORE? Are you MAD?!
Didn't they reference it during the Sion rework though (Leblanc's conversation with Swain)?  I'm pretty sure that was _after_ the Great Retcon, if I remember correctly.
And then Garen says darkly "Long live the King".
Plot twist: Garen can't kill J4 because that's treason committed against his beloved country.
Patch 5.18: Garen now yells NOXUS upon killing Demacian champions with his ultimate.

> [{quoted}](name=5000000000000000,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=RzU9KbEX,comment-id=00090000,timestamp=2015-09-13T07:54:31.481+0000)
>
> Patch 5.18: Garen now yells NOXUS upon killing Demacian champions with his ultimate.

YES THIS WOULD BE SO COOL!!! NOXUSSSSSSS

To clarify to some people who think J4 isn't real: In Sion's previews, there's a passage where it says Leblanc used Jarvan's blood (the 3rd? don't remember) to imitate the prince for the battle where J4 attacked randomly. So the current J4 is real but Leblanc could imitate him again for this lore Easter egg.
He may be real, but it's got to be hard (even for LB) to get his blood.  What if LB is still imitating J4, and the 'real' J4 is held prisoner in Noxus somewhere?
Plot twist: LeBlanc is actually Jarvin IV in disguise
Plot twist: leblanc is actually jarvan I
The JoJ isn't canon. Their respective lore isn't canon. Nothing is canon. Now please buy our new champion.
i'm still upset that that story didn't get finished cuz that was the greatest plot twist
I honestly have no idea what this is referencing, but Riot focusing on lore is always a good thing.
